requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound device

  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound device

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

  • Processor: i5 3GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: VR headset is required

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

results.name: Bob the Builder's Basics in Construction and Stuff
Van Helsing: La historia no contada

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Around 30 FPS in Low/Medium quality settings in FullHD (1080p).
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Around 60 FPS in High/Ultra quality settings in FullHD (1080p) with Ray Tracing disabled.

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus only
